metadata.title: CVE-2014-0217 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: enrol/index.php in Moodle 2.6.x before 2.6.3 does not check for themoodle/course:viewhiddencourses capability before listing hidden courses,which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive name and summaryinformation about these courses by leveraging the guest role and visiting acrafted URL.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
